title: Brian Jones
summary: Lewis Brian Hopkin Jones[1][2] (28 February 1942 â€“ 3 July 1969) was an English musician and composer, best known as the founder and original leader of the Rolling Stones.[3] Initially a slide guitarist, Jones went on to play a wide variety of instruments on Rolling Stones recordings and in concerts, from lead and rhythm guitar and sitar to various keyboard and wind instruments.
